trans-unit.source: Represents an ordered pair of floating-point x- and y-coordinates that defines a point in a two-dimensional plane.
trans-unit.target: 2차원 평면의 한 점을 정의하는 부동 소수점 X 좌표와 Y 좌표의 정렬된 쌍을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: To convert a <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> to a <xref:System.Drawing.Point>, use <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Round%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Truncate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 변환 하는 <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> 에 <xref:System.Drawing.Point>를 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Round%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 또는 <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Truncate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal position of the point.
trans-unit.target: 점의 가로 위치입니다.

trans-unit.source: The vertical position of the point.
trans-unit.target: 점의 세로 위치입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> class with the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 좌표를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: Translates a given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> by the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 크기에 따라 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />를 변환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to translate.
trans-unit.target: 변환할 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that specifies the numbers to add to the coordinates of <c>pt</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>pt</c>의 좌표에 추가할 숫자를 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Translates a given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> by the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />에 따라 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />를 변환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The translated <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.
trans-unit.target: 변환된 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Add%2A> method adds the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> of the specified size to the x-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> and the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> to the y-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Add%2A> 메서드 추가 <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> 의 x 좌표를 지정된 된 크기의는 <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> 및 <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> 의 y 좌표는 <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to translate.
trans-unit.target: 변환할 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> that specifies the numbers to add to the coordinates of <c>pt</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>pt</c>의 좌표에 추가할 숫자를 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Translates a given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> by a specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />에 따라 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />를 변환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The translated <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.
trans-unit.target: 변환된 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Add%2A> method adds the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> of the specified size to the x-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> and the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A> to the y-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Add%2A> 메서드 추가 <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> 의 x 좌표를 지정된 된 크기의는 <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> 및 <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A> 의 y 좌표는 <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Add%2A> 메서드를 사용하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 이 예제를 실행 하려면 Windows Form에 다음 코드를 붙여 넣습니다.

trans-unit.source: Handle the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call `AddExample`, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 폼의 처리 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> 이벤트 및 호출 `AddExample`전달 `e` 으로 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Represents a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> class with member data left uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 초기화되지 않은 데이터 멤버가 있는 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to test.
trans-unit.target: 테스트할 <see cref="T:System.Object" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> contains the same coordinates as the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />가 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Object" />와 좌표가 같은지 여부를 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method returns <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> and has the same coordinates as this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="obj" />가 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />이고 이 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />와 좌표가 같으면 이 메서드는 <see langword="true" />를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 구조체의 해시 코드를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: An integer value that specifies a hash value for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 구조체의 해시 값을 지정하는 정수 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> is empty.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />가 비어 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if both <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.Y" /> are 0; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.X" />와 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.Y" />가 모두 0이면 <see langword="true" />를 반환하고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: Translates the given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> by a specified size.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 크기에 따라 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />를 변환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to translate.
trans-unit.target: 변환할 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that specifies the pair of numbers to add to the coordinates of <c>pt</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>pt</c>의 좌표에 추가할 두 수를 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Translates a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> by a given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />가 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />를 변환합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the translated <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.
trans-unit.target: 변환된 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a shadow to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> using the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.op_Addition%2A> operator.
trans-unit.target: 그림자를 추가 하는 다음 코드 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> 를 사용 하는 <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.op_Addition%2A> 연산자입니다.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 이 예제는 Windows Form을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste this code into a form and call the `AddShadow` method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: 이 예제를 실행 하려면 폼 호출에이 코드를 붙여는 `AddShadow` 메서드 폼의 처리할 때 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Make sure the form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> named `listBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 폼에 포함 되어 있는지 확인 한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> 라는 `listBox1`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to translate.
trans-unit.target: 변환할 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> that specifies the numbers to add to the x- and y-coordinates of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />의 X 좌표 및 Y 좌표에 추가할 숫자를 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Translates the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> by the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />에 따라 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />를 변환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The translated <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.
trans-unit.target: 변환된 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.op_Addition%2A> operator adds the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> of the specified size to the x-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> and the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A> to the y-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.op_Addition%2A> 연산자는 추가 하는 <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> 의 x 좌표를 지정된 된 크기의는 <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> 및 <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A> 의 y 좌표에는 <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Add%28System.Drawing.PointF%2CSystem.Drawing.SizeF%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 이 연산자는 해당 하는 방법은 <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Add%28System.Drawing.PointF%2CSystem.Drawing.SizeF%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.op_Addition%2A> operator.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.는 <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.op_Addition%2A> 연산자입니다.

trans-unit.target: 이 예제를 실행 하려면 Windows Form에 다음 코드를 붙여 넣습니다.

trans-unit.source: Handle the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call `opAdditionExample`, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 폼의 처리 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> 이벤트 및 호출 `opAdditionExample`전달 `e` 으로 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: @FSHO2@비교할 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: @FSHO2@비교할 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: 두 개의 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 구조체를 비교합니다.

trans-unit.source: The result specifies whether the values of the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.Y" /> properties of the two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures are equal.
trans-unit.target: 결과는 두 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.X" /> 구조체의 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.Y" /> 및 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 속성 값이 같은지 여부를 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.Y" /> values of the left and right <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 왼쪽과 오른쪽의 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.X" /> 구조체의 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.Y" /> 및 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> 값이 같으면 <see langword="true" />를 반환하고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.op_Equality%2A> operator.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.는 <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.op_Equality%2A> 연산자입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to compare.

trans-unit.target: @FSHO2@비교할 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the coordinates of the specified points are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 점의 좌표가 같지 않은지 여부를 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.Y" /> values of <paramref name="left" /> and <paramref name="right" /> are not equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" /> 및 <paramref name="right" />의 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.X" /> 및 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.Y" /> 값이 같지 않으면 <see langword="true" />를 반환하고 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.target: <c>pt</c> 좌표에서 뺄 숫자를 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Translates a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> by the negative of a specified size.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 크기의 음수를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />를 변환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The translated <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.
trans-unit.target: 변환된 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Subtract%2A> method subtracts the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> of the specified size from the x-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> and the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> from the y-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Subtract%2A> 메서드 뺍니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> 의 x 좌표를 지정된 된 크기의는 <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> 및 <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> 의 y-좌표에서는 <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to translate.
trans-unit.target: 변환할 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> that specifies the numbers to subtract from the coordinates of <c>pt</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>pt</c> 좌표에서 뺄 숫자를 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Translates a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> by the negative of a specified size.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 크기의 음수를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />를 변환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The translated <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.
trans-unit.target: 변환된 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Subtract%2A> method subtracts the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> of the specified size from the x-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> and the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A> from the y-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Subtract%2A> 메서드 뺍니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> 의 x 좌표를 지정된 된 크기의는 <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> 및 <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A> 의 y-좌표에서는 <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Subtract%2A> operator.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.는 <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Subtract%2A> 연산자입니다.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 이 예제를 실행 하려면 Windows Form에 다음 코드를 붙여 넣습니다.

trans-unit.source: Handle the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call `SubtractExample`, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 폼의 처리 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> 이벤트 및 호출 `SubtractExample`전달 `e` 으로 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Converts this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to a human readable string.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />를 사람이 인식할 수 있는 문자열로 변환합니다.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />를 나타내는 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the x-coordinate of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />의 x좌표를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />의 x좌표입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the y-coordinate of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />의 y좌표를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />의 y좌표입니다.
